headline: Airbnb’s AI Shift New CTO And Support Agent Reshape Investment Case
summary: Airbnb has hired Ahmad Al-Dahle, former head of generative AI at Meta, as its new chief technology officer. The company has rolled out a custom AI support agent that currently handles about one third of customer support cases in North America. Airbnb plans to expand this AI system globally, aiming to reshape how guests and hosts interact with the platform. Airbnb, NasdaqGS:ABNB, is leaning heavily into AI at a time when its share price sits at $121.35 and its value score is 4. The stock has...
